description:
Teach Online - Online Instructor Masterclass - Master The Business Fast

Do you want to build an online instructor residual income based business?

Do you want to learn how to master online course creation quickly?

Do you want to learn how to do this from someone who has over 15 years of experience building online business and has created over 40 popular courses?

A Comprehensive Course

This course is a no nonsense comprehensive course designed to help you learn all the aspects of building an online instructor business.

It is also designed to get you to your destination fast, teaching the core principles simply and quickly.

You will master online course creation and business building FAST.

The Core Principles

This course will take you through the Golden Triangle of online instructor business building, so that you can master your teaching skills, course production and business marketing without any fuss.

What Is Taught In The Course:

  • Online Course Building
  • Mastering Audio
  • Mastering Video Lighting
  • Mastering Green Screen
  • The Art Of Teaching Online
  • On Camera Presence

Online Course Building

Learn how to plan and build an online course so that it is structured for a student to best take advantage of it.

Mastering Audio

Learn how to master audio recording in a home based studio environment.

Mastering Video Lighting

Master the art of lighting a subject for your video production.

Mastering Green Screen

Learn how to set up a live chroma key mini studio and record complex presentations

The Art Of Teaching Online

Learn how to teach online using online video instruction core skills.

On Camera Presence

Learn how to overcome a fear of the camera and some simple techniques that will dramatically increase your professionalism in front of the camera.

Join Me

So join me on the other side and start your online instructor business building adventure and learn how to develop your own residual income business right now!
title: Teach Online - Online Instructor Course Creation Masterclass
